films.title: Damsel
films.description: A young woman agrees to marry a handsome prince -- only to discover it was all a trap. She is thrown into a cave with a fire-breathing dragon and must rely solely on her wits and will to survive

films.title: Divergent
films.description: In a divided, war-torn world, Tris discovers her specialabilities and bands with Four to resist a sinister plot against those like them.

films.title: Mea Culpa
films.description: A criminal defense attorney must choose between family, duty and her own dangerous desires when she takes on the case of an artist accused of murder.

films.title: The Maze Runner
films.description: In a postapocalyptic future, a group of teenage boys are trapped in a mysterious community where they must solve a giant maze in order to survive.

films.title: Irish Wish
films.description: Maddie's dream guy is days away from marrying her best friend when a wish for true love made on an ancient stone in Ireland magically alters her fate.

films.title: Players
films.description: A sports writer unused to relationships falls for a fling, leading her to reconsider playing the field in favor of commitment.

films.title: Art Of Love
films.description: After learning that the art thief she has been chasing is her ex-lover, an officer working for Interpol concocts a plan to catch him red-handed.

films.title: Lift
films.description: A master thief is wooed by his ex-girlfriend and the FBI to pull off an impossible heist with his international crew on a 777 passenger flight from London to Zurich.

films.title: Midnight Sun
films.description: Born with a fatal sensitivity to sunlight, a sheltered teen girl falls for her neighbor, but hides her condition from him as their romance blossoms.

films.title: Disconnect
films.description: After falling victim to a scam, a desperate man races the clock as he attempts to plan a luxurious destination wedding for an important investor.
